Author: jl777c#5810
Content: of course offchain agreements could be made for future revshares, but in some sense that is a business arrangement and not so sure that is against things anyway. if a whale wants to manage a tech to do the NN, then is that really so wrong?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: since it seems we cant stop this, maybe the answer is to facilitate it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: have a set of qualified tech NN operators and they can match up with some whale

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think the sensitivities about election manipulation is exaggerated, its not like an elected notary can "push the red button" or change policy, pass laws

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and ultimately it is what the stake wants to do that decides and if the stake decides to hire out a tech, then so be it
